name: GuestSpeaker
0:
”Alexa, ask guest speaker to read us a speech.”
”Alexa, ask guest speaker for help.”
”Alexa, ask guest speaker to tell me about small business.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guest speaker
des:
This skill provides short speeches about the Internet of Thing (IOT) and about small business. It may be useful for club meetings or demonstrations. Opinions and statistics are my opinion only. 

This skill is intended for entertainment purposes only.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
